titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 5099) to provide disaster assistance to agricultural producers for crop and livestock losses, and for other purposes.
Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 5099) to provide disaster assistance to agricultural producers for crop and livestock losses, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Rules.
Motion to Discharge Committee filed by Mr. Barrow. Petition No: 109-16.

bill.summary: Sets forth the rule for consideration of the bill (H.R. 5099) to provide disaster assistance to agricultural producers for crop and livestock losses.
